title: (x) Norway Community logo serif face - Titus {Marcelo Rodi}
content:
Does anyone know this font?

Thanks,  
Jeremy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110321235702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5867.jpg)
author: adpressinc

comments.content: I think it’s [Titus](http://web.archive.org/web/20110321235702/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/titus/) although it’s a different weight.
